definitions.definition: Software that is packed with too many features and therefore slow or unwieldy ; software that is inefficiently designed and occupies an excessive amount of memory or disk space.
Unwanted pre- installed software , especially on a smartphone .

main_definition: ( computing , informal ) Software that is packed with too many features and therefore slow or unwieldy ; software that is inefficiently designed and occupies an excessive amount of memory or disk space.
secondary_definitions: ( computing ) Unwanted pre- installed software , especially on a smartphone .
